title: Add team to projects page
body_html:
Solves #19

  • Restore the association between team and the project they are working on
  • Add link to the team activities page in the Projects table
  • Create rake task for populating the team.project_id

Follow up:

  • After the records are updated with project_id, the project_name can be removed from the table.

Some background notes:
The team-project association has been removed in 7bcef84 as part of #354, the introduction of Project Proposals.

And even more background:
At that point an application had both a project_id and a team_id.
Later on, the project_id in the application got replaced by the project1_id and project2_id, and stored in the application_data hstore.
body_text:

Create rake task for populating the team.project_id

Follow up:

 After the records are updated with project_id,  the project_name can be removed from the table.

Some background notes:
The team-project association has been removed in 7bcef84 as part of #354, the introduction of Project Proposals.
And even more background:
At that point an application had both a project_id and a team_id.
Later on, the project_id in the application got replaced by the project1_id and project2_id, and stored in the application_data hstore.
body:
Solves #19 

- Restore the association between team and the project they are working on
- Add link to the team activities page in the Projects table 
- Create rake task for populating the `team.project_id`
  
Follow up: 
- [ ] After the records are updated with `project_id`,  the project_name can be removed from the table. 

Some background notes:
The team-project association has been removed in https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/commit/7bcef84b42c13858a4cb106a8cab22f42dab6a59 as part of #354, the introduction of Project Proposals.

And even more background:
At that point an `application` had both a `project_id` and a `team_id`. 
Later on, the `project_id` in the application got replaced by the `project1_id` and `project2_id`, and stored in the [application_data hstore. ](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blame/2e1936722aece933f03b7457a29f2d46f85c119a/app/models/application_data.rb)
